awards.description: THIS PROJECT WILL ASSIST THE NATIVE VILLAGE OF PORT LIONS IN BUILDING CAPACITY AND DEVELOPING PROGRAMS TO PROTECT THE ENVIRONMENT AND HEALTH.  TASKS INCLUDE MAINTAINING AN ENVIRONMENTAL OFFICE AND PROGRAM; RESEARCHING ISSUES AND RESOURCES AND ATTENDING TRAINING; COMMUNICATING WITH OTHER AGENCIES AND CONDUCTING OUTREACH EVENTS; CONDUCTING SOURCE SEPARATION, RESOURCE RECOVERY, AND CLEANUP EVENTS; UPDATING THE INVENTORY, DEVELOPING THE SPILL RESPONSE PROGRAM, GIS CAPABILITIES, AND COLLECTING OCEAN WATER QUALITY DATA AND ASSESSING BASELINE SURFACE WATER QUALITY.

DESCRIPTION:THIS PROJECT WILL ASSIST THE NATIVE VILLAGE OF PORT LIONS IN BUILDING CAPACITIES AND DEVELOPING PROGRAMS TO PROTECT THE TRIBAL ENVIRONMENT AND HEALTH.  OBJECTIVES/WORKPLAN COMPONENTS INCLUDE: 1. BUILDING ADMINISTRATIVE CAPACITY; 2. BUILDING PROGRAMMATIC CAPACITY; 3. BUILDING COMMUNICATIONS CAPACITY; 4. BUILDING SOLID AND HAZARDOUS WASTE MANAGEMENT CAPACITY; AND 5. BUILDING TECHNICAL CAPACITY.ACTIVITIES:WORKPLAN ACTIVITIES/TASKS INCLUDE: MAINTAINING AN ENVIRONMENTAL OFFICE AND ADMINISTRATIVE AND PROGRAM MANAGEMENT FUNCTIONS; ATTENDING TRAINING AND RESEARCHING ISSUES AND RESOURCES; COMMUNICATING INTERNALLY AND EXTERNALLY ABOUT ISSUES; CONDUCTING COMMUNITY EDUCATION ACTIVITIES; CONDUCTING SOURCE SEPARATION AND RESOURCE RECOVERY ACTIVITIES; BUILDING TECHNICAL KNOWLEDGE OF WATER, AIR, AND WASTE; DEVELOPING AN ENVIRONMENTAL INVENTORY; DEVELOPING A SPILL RESPONSE PROGRAM; AND COLLECTING BASELINE OCEAN AND SURFACE WATER QUALITY DATA.  SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:THE INTENDED BENEFICIARIES OF THIS PROJECT ARE THE NATIVE VILLAGE OF PORT LIONS, TRIBAL MEMBERS, AND THE LOCAL PUBLIC.  THE EXPECTED OUTCOMES OF THIS PROJECT INCLUDE: INCREASING TRIBAL ADMINISTRATIVE CAPACITY TO RESPOND TO LOCAL ENVIRONMENTAL CONCERNS; INCREASING TRIBAL PROGRAMMATIC CAPACITY TO ASSESS LOCAL ENVIRONMENTAL ISSUES; INCREASING COMMUNITY KNOWLEDGE OF ENVIRONMENTAL ISSUES AND ACTIONS PROTECTIVE OF THE ENVIRONMENT; DECREASING AMOUNTS OF RECYCLABLES AND HAZARDOUS WASTES ENTERING LANDFILL; AND INCREASING TRIBAL TECHNICAL CAPACITIES TO PRIORITIZE ENVIRONMENTAL NEEDS AND DEVELOP PROGRAMS TO ADDRESS THEM.  ANTICIPATED DELIVERABLES INCLUDE: PERFORMANCE REPORTS; COPIES OF OUTREACH MATERIALS; EVENT SUMMARY REPORTS; RECYCLING AND WASTE ACTIVITY REPORTS; AND AN UPDATED ENVIRONMENTAL INVENTORY.
PORT LIONS A12AV00889 M1 FY12 ROAD MAINTENANCE FUNDS
